CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, September 16, 1950, pg. 2, reads: "Pitt Summer Commencement - Numerous Negro students were among the persons graduating or receiving degrees at the University of Pittsburgh's summer commencement held in Soldiers and Sailors Memorial Hall last Friday evening. Among them were...Top right: Ethelbert W. Hawkins received a Master of Science degree in mathematics, and Paul Bell Jr., a Master of Science degree in zoology... - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Portrait of University of Pittsburgh graduates Ethelbert W. Hawkins and Paul Bell Jr., posed in hallway of Soldiers and Sailors Memorial Hall
